title: How did you manage bother NCERT and other books while preparing neet. I mean did you first read NCERT and then go to other books are did you read both NCERT and other books at the same time? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: I used to read NCERT then after I used to solve NCERT based Questions ,questions of module and previous year Questions of that chapter next day.. Why next day??? As u have read the chap today itself… then u will be able to tick the answer without confusion and u will not be able to know what was the concept / topic I missed….Next day u will be able able to revise that chap through Questions and u are reading other chapter too… through this u will be able to cover 2chapters in a day…If some Questions concept was not clear to me I used to see the topic firstly from NCERT.. if not cleared then from ref. Books… If u are appearing this year only…then u must follow the points given below :- . . **Make a priority list according to ur convenince and weightage in neet.. Like this  (Make this priority list separately for 11th & 12th NCERT..) Read minimum 1–1 chap from both NCERT in a day.. 1st day :- Day :- Read 1st chap of both priority list..Night :- Read last chap of both priority list .2nd day :- Day :- Read 2nd chap of both priority list+ Revise 1st chap of priority list (which u studied yesterday) Night :- Read 2nd last chap of both priority list+ Revise the chap which u studied yesterday night. 3rd day :- Day :- read the next chap of both priority list + Revise earlier 2 chapters Night :- read the successive chapter. + Revise earlier 2 chapters. . . Continue it till NEET….. At the end… whole of the NCERT will be in ur Hand… “REVISION IS THE KEY TO SUCCESS” . . Before NEET I followed this schedule and I was able to tick questions within seconds and without any confusion in NEET and after NEET when I matched with answer key my 85Quetsions were correct… So, I suggest u this schedule… Hope you will work hard and do better… Thanks Nainsi Vats
